title: Randy Scott
description: This episode means a lot to me, and it would mean a lot to me if you kept in mind as you listen that it must have been difficult for Randy to open up about this stuff, especially on a podcast. I’m really grateful to him for trusting us with that. So try to listen with the kindest part of your heart, and see if you can learn anything from his experience. LYMI
